name: "Sylvie" Tweed Newsboy Cap
description:
“Je généralement éviter la tentation à moins que je ne peux pas résister.” 
(I generally avoid temptation unless I can’t resist it)

Mae West said it herself, and from the bashfulness that Sylvie exudes, it appears to be true. It is very hard to avoid those temptations we all desire, like the need for a new hat. Join Sylvie as she lives out her greatest desires with her one of a kind hat. 

This lovely newsboy cap is composed of earth tone tweed with an embroidered appliqué purple flower attached to the side. Size Womans Medium Cap.

<hr>
Each Couture Hat is shipped in it's own hat box for protection and safe keeping during shipping and in your closet.

name: "Angevin" Cotton Newsboy Cap
description:
"Angevin" Elle est la déesse de vin
(She is the goddess of wine)

Angevin aims to get you drunk on her high fashion sense and good tastes. After all, she is the goddess of wine. In this very French vineyard inspired cap, our sweet Angevin invites you to her table to drink up and soak in the goodness that is this newsboy cap adorned with textured flowers and presented to you for your approval.

Composed of natural duck feathers adorned with vintage buttons and appliqué flowers.  

<hr>
Each Couture Hat is shipped in it's own vintage hat box for protection and safe keeping during shipping and in your closet.  Each hat box is unique and different!

name: "Pearly Blue Love You Too!" Feather Fascinator
description:
Don’t forget Miss Pearl. She’ll always love you! And ya wanna know how I know? Well silly cause she shares her most beloved blue birds w/handmade flowers right here with you. Now she trusts that you’ll give them a good home, so do not disappoint. Wear this lovely feather fascinator with your cute white sandals or sassy black dress. This lively feather fascinator is made out of soft turquoise-tinted feathers with a bright white leather flower with black accents. ATTACH TO HAIR: with a comb mounted beneath. Simply push into your hair. Lightweight and easy to wear.
Each Couture Fascinator is carefully wrapped in tissue paper to protect it during shipping and in your closet.

name: "Autumn" Newsboy Cap
description:
“Verdad que parece esperar el otono que pase algo?” p. neruda (Is it true that autumn seems to wait for something to happen?) Autumn is not just a name or a season, it is a feeling. It is the smell of squash and pumpkins, the sound of leaves crunching under your feet and the cool crisp winds at your face forcing you in doors to spend time with loved ones. There is no better place to be during Autumn than the Midwest. People get together and slow down after the hustle and bustle of summer. We take the time to enjoy the sensations, each other and great food. It is also a time where we cannot forget about the fashions. With its sturdy brown, dashes of greens and yellows and throws of deep red, fall is our natural inspiration for this piece. And it really will keep your head warm too! Get your piece of Autumn today!
Earth tone tweed newsboy cap with natural pheasant feathers on side. Silver deer brooch adorns the side.
Each Couture Hat is shipped in a vintage inspired, 100% recycled material hat box for protection and safe keeping during shipping and in your closet.

name: "Francoise" Vintage Fedora Feather Hat
description:
“Fleurs plaisir tout en plumes s'enflammer”

(Flowers delight while feathers ignite)

		
Universally the combination of heavy fabrics, darker colors and pieces of nature signify our transition from summer into fall but the lively adornments on this piece beg to differ. A gentle floral and twig arrangement sits atop two remarkably wine colored feather pieces. Alone, these pieces make a statement by themselves, but pair them up with the iconic “Old Man Hat” and now you’ve got a piece that shines from summer all the way through fall, winter and spring.

<hr>
Each Couture Hat is shipped in it's own vintage hat box for protection and safe keeping during shipping and in your closet. Each hat box is unique and different!
